price: (3) And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
